Bachelor thesis

Process optimization of help desk software by classifying business objects into open support requests

A new support request with undeterministic text content requires a bunch of time to assign specific attributes to it, for example a priority and a category. My bachelor thesis analyzed the theory of Support Vector Machines and how they could be applied to this real world problem. It was shown that a SVM can assign those attributes automatically and induce a decrease of the processing time.
